fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 148.0%/155.4%/162.8% of Attack. If target's HP is below 50%, increase damage by 40%.
fixed_skill.name: Sharp Claws

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bufudyne

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 12.5%. At the end of the turn, gain Fighting Spirit, increasing Attack by 10%. After defeating a foe, gain 2 Fighting Spirit stacks. Stacks up to 6 times.
passive_skill.name: Raise Morale

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 12.5%. At the end of the turn, gain Fighting Spirit, increasing Attack by 11.5%. After defeating a foe, gain 2 Fighting Spirit stacks. Stacks up to 6 times.
passive_skill.name: Raise Morale I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 12.5%. At the end of the turn, gain Fighting Spirit, increasing Attack by 11.5% and critical rate by 1.2%. After defeating a foe, gain 2 Fighting Spirit stacks. Stacks up to 6 times.
passive_skill.name: Raise Morale II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
